ISSUE.TITLE: TypeConverters for list are not registered if IgnoreStartupTasks is set to true.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 Steps to reproduce the problem: Set `IgnoreStartupTasks` in `appsettings.json`. Setting `IgnoreStartupTasks` to **false** in app settings does not trigger `RunStartupTasks` (**NopEngine**) which doesn't execute `TypeConverterRegistrationStartUpTask`. Some of the settings of type List (IE: **SeoSettings.ReservedUrlRecordSlugs**) are not converted cause they don't pass this [validation](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/c418122223ecd09c690cecaf120cda378bff202d/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Configuration/SettingService.cs#L376): ``` if (!TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(prop.PropertyType).CanConvertFrom(typeof(string))) continue; ``` Is this an expected behavior ? Shouldn't type converters always be set ?
